comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Bucknam Pasha or Pacha (1869-1915) was a Canadian-born American citizen, Ransford Dodsworth Bucknam, who served as a Rear Admiral in the Turkish Navy. He was working as an officer at a shipbuilding company in Philadelphia; he delivered a war ship to Constantinople, and became a favorite of the Sultan's. He later formed the Ottoman Anglo-American Company. maviboncuk.blogspot.com/2010/03/bucknam-pasha-of-ottoman-... yesteryearsnews.wordpress.com/tag/ransford-d-bucknam/
